title: Got S+ but no token
body: So I just got done playing a game as Rammus Jungle and I finished the game leveling him up to Mastery Rank 5. I also got an S+ in that game and the client said I got a token for getting the rating but it's not in my hextec crafting area. It normally appears as soon as you get it but I've logged out and back in the game to see if that fixed it and it didn't.

replies.body:
*Zombiemaster* is correct here. The messaging when you hit level 5 is to inform you that you can **now start earning tokens** rather than you *have earned a token*. Sometimes the excitement can cause a bit of confusion, but I thought I'd clarify that a bit further.

You can read more about the Champion Mastery System in [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.

I understand now that you can't get the token upon directly leveling up, but what I am wondering now is why did I get the message for it in the first place. I'm thinking that the system doesn't expect a player to get at least an S- when a person reaches lvl 5 on that champion but at the same time I feel like that could be often if it is mentioned in a post.

The message can be confusing if read through very quickly, and we can compare the two messages below. The first is the message you get when you hit level 5 mastery and the second is the message you receive when you've earned a token.

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/DAvBm

I hope this clears up the confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5WrNjJqr,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-16T21:54:06.845+0000)
>
> The message can be confusing if read through very quickly, and we can compare the two messages below. The first is the message you get when you hit level 5 mastery and the second is the message you receive when you've earned a token.
> 
> (Click to enlarge)
> https://imgur.com/a/DAvBm
> 
> I hope this clears up the confusion!

Hi, I had the same problem but just to clarify. (this is my situation)  I level up my champion to Level 5 and it will just say that I can get the champion to level 6 but it won't give me a Token even though I got an S in the same game where I leveled up?

Sorry for the really delayed response but at that time I got both messages and that's mostly why I put this thread in. I completely forgot to mention that I got both messages or I wasn't too clear either way I got Rammus to tier 6 later that week because enemy team starts doing an all AD team comp after I pick him in draft

You actually can't earn a token for the same game you reach mastery level 5. The notification that showed up was stating that you are now eligible to earn tokens with that champion, not that you have actually earned one.
